channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2019-4676|2024-09-17T02:41:13.529Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0.2 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 171512.

item.title: CVE-2019-4705|2024-09-17T02:21:16.465Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0.2 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 172015.
